      17249                                  watch_di
             alog_init_ext_diff_tool
      17250                                  DIALOG_M
             ODE=8
      17251                                  ;;
      17243 -                            4)  # Close
            -button
      17252 +                            5)  # Close
            +button
      17253                                  DIALOG_M
             ODE=0
      17254                                  ;;
      17255                          esac

  SETUP_FOCUS initialization when the dialog opens. Let me
  also look for where SETUP_FOCUS=0 is reset:

  there's a reference to the setup dialog hints or
  auto-prompt that checks specific focus values:

   and gitignore (the most critical setup items) to decide
  whether to highlight the setup button. Task interception
  is optional and doesn't need the yellow indicator.

  settings_load_all_values
